meta.description: Optimize the production of plastic containers to minimize total cost while meeting demand.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each container in cm^3

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand for each type of container in units

params.name: variable_cost
params.description: Variable cost per unit for each container type in ¥

params.name: fixed_cost
params.description: Fixed cost for using equipment for each container type in ¥

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of units produced for each container type

vars.name: use_equipment
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if equipment for a container type is used

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(variable_cost[c] * production[c] + fixed_cost * use_equipment[c] for c in CONTAINERS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of production including variable and fixed costs

constraints.name: equipment_usage_1
constraints.description: Link equipment usage to production for container type 1

constraints.name: equipment_usage_2
constraints.description: Link equipment usage to production for container type 2

constraints.name: equipment_usage_3
constraints.description: Link equipment usage to production for container type 3

constraints.name: equipment_usage_4
constraints.description: Link equipment usage to production for container type 4

constraints.name: equipment_usage_5
constraints.description: Link equipment usage to production for container type 5

constraints.description: Link equipment usage to production for container type 6
